i know it she's a yandere but wtf, i cant even process the plot

I really enjoy Yandere. But sometimes I think these setups just could not possibly happen in real life. If you wanted to have sex with someone forever how can you ignore things like hunger, water, housing expenses, and human relationships. If something like this were to happen irl I'm sure the mother would soon notice the broken glass and come question the daughter. As for the two stuck in the room, it wouldn't take them too long to get tired or hungry. And I'm uncertain the effectiveness a single tube of superglue has on the mechanics of a doorknob. It also seems to me that, from the time she applied the superglue to when he attempted to open the door, not enough time had passed for it to harden. Even if it had I feel that a regular man would be able to force something like that to open.
To afoird getting gutted by a yandere that would do anything to be with u just fuck her and Fuck her real hard
Kahn: I shall leave you as you left me, as you left her; marooned for all eternity in the center of a dead planet... buried alive! Buried alive ...
